_GEng_ImageLoad.documentation: Creates an image object from a file, or a rectangular part of a file
_GEng_ImageLoad.label: _GEng_ImageLoad($sPath, $imgW = Default, $imgH = Default, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)

params.label: $sPath
params.documentation: Path the file (supports bmp, gif, jpg, png, tiff, emf)

params.label: $imgW
params.documentation: Width Size of the image object (default = width of the image file)

params.label: $imgH
params.documentation: Height Size of the image object (default = height of the image file)

params.label: $x
params.documentation: Top left corners position of the rectangle

params.label: $y
params.documentation: Top left corners position of the rectangle

_GEng_ImageLoadStream.documentation: Creates an image object from a string representing binary image file data
_GEng_ImageLoadStream.label: _GEng_ImageLoadStream($pic, $imgW = Default, $imgH = Default, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)

params.label: $pic
params.documentation: String Representing binary image file data

params.label: $imgW
params.documentation: Width Size of the image object (default = width of the image file)

params.label: $imgH
params.documentation: Height Size of the image object (default = height of the image file)

params.label: $x
params.documentation: Top left corners position of the rectangle

params.label: $y
params.documentation: Top left corners position of the rectangle
